name: quizzically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that seems to ask a question: They looked at me quizzically. "America?" he answered quizzically. See
quizzical
More examplesFewer examplesHe frowned at me quizzically.She turned quizzically to face him.Two bright eyes peered out at him quizzically.
